metadata.Title: CVE-2022-32317 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The MPlayer Project v1.5 was discovered to contain a heap use-after-free resulting in a double free in the preinit function at libvo/vo_v4l2.c. This vulnerability can lead to a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted file. The device=strdup statement is not executed on every call.

criterions.comment: mplayer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
